sec.title: Operator cab (operator enclosure)
sec.p: If the machine is fitted with an operator cab, the following applies:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: there shall be an operator protective structure in accordance with 4.2.4.1;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: required space, leg room, etc. should be in accordance with ISO 3411 and ISO 6682;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: if there is a seated operator’s position, seatbelts shall be provided that shall be in accordance with ISO 6683;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: a seat, unless the operator has to work in a standing position, shall provide the operator with a comfortable and stable working position and shall be easily adaptable to operators of different weight and height. ISO 11112 should be used for guidance. The seat shall be designed to reduce vibrations transmitted to the operator to the lowest level that can be reasonably achieved, in accordance with 4.17.3;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: for determining the seat index point, ISO 5353 should be used for guidance;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: the material of the interior of the operator cab shall be in accordance with the requirements of 4.16.1 and 4.16.2;

list-item.label: g)
list-item.p: there shall be either an emergency exit in accordance with ISO 2867, on a different side of the operator cab from that where the normal exit is situated, e.g. in the form of knock-out windows or knock-out panels, or tools shall be provided for breaking the window unless normal exit/entrance is for both sides of the machine;

list-item.label: h)
list-item.p: there shall be an isolation against vibration of the floor in accordance with 4.17.3;

list-item.label: i)
list-item.p: there shall be a protection against noise in accordance with 4.17.2;

list-item.label: j)
list-item.p: operator enclosure environment shall be designed using ISO 10263 (all parts) as applicable to the surrounding environmental conditions;

list-item.label: k)
list-item.p: windows shall be made of safety glass or other material that provides similar safety performance. The glazing may be adapted to the protection level required as per the risks existing in the use environment. See, for example, ECE R43, EN 356, EN 13123-2, EN 13124-2 and EN 15152-2;

list-item.label: l)
list-item.p: there shall be window cleaning devices for each window essential for visibility during operations;

list-item.label: m)
list-item.p: if provided, the filling point of the tank of the window washers shall be easily accessible.
